projects.title: What makes a good Microservice?
projects.description: Join me as I realize user requirements for one of my clients. We'll see why employing a microservice design works well in this instance, and which considerations to make to ensure a proper implementation.

projects.title: A voice for 450+ medical specialists
projects.description: In early 2020, the Dutch national palliative care set out to unify their staff planning and telecommunications under one system. It fell upon me to design and implement this system. Now, years later - I look back to appreciate what victories were achieved and what lessons can be learnt.
